properties.verseOrder: v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Moa ve Jeso fantatrao
Ny manjo ahy ety ?
Moa ve mbola atsotranao
Ilay sandrim-pitia,
Sa kosa efa nilaozanao
Ity mahantra ity ?

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
:
Efa sasatra, efa reraka
Mafy ny ady atao.
Efa trotraka, toa ho ketraka
Ka faingàna Ianao.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Moa ve Jeso fantatrao :
Maro ny rafy ety ?
Malemy ny mpanomponao
Sao tsy tody ary.
Tompo ô, omeo hery vao
Mba hitohy ny dia.
Efa sasatra, sns.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Fantatro fa mijaly ianao
Raha mbola ety
Nefa Izaho efa momba anao
Ka herezo ny dia.
Kely sisa hiaretanao
Dia ho tody ary.
Efa sasatra, sns.
